name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-multilist-grid
title: Multi-list Grid
shortDescription: React-multilist-grid is an SPFX web part that uses React, Office-UI-Fabric, and Redux to let users edit list data from lists that reside in multiple webs and multiple sites in a single grid, similar to Quick Edit mode. The lists do not to be of the same type – you just need to create column mappings to tell the web part which fields to show in which columns of the grid.
longDescription: React-multilist-grid is an SPFX web part that uses React, Office-UI-Fabric, and Redux to let users edit list data from lists that reside in multiple webs and multiple sites in a single grid, similar to Quick Edit mode. The lists do not to be of the same type – you just need to create column mappings to tell the web part which fields to show in which columns of the grid.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
